hours_text:
**Directions to Museum**  
From Interstate 86 / State Route 17 (Southern Tier Expressway), Exit 33 in Almond. Follow signs for Alfred University to Route 21 south and to Route 244 into Alfred. When Route 244 bears right up the hill, continue straight into the village on Main Street and turn Left into the Alfred University Campus on Pine Street at the stop light.

Visitor parking is located behind the Museum, which is immediately on the left after turning on Pine Street. See [Campus Map](http://web.archive.org/web/20250910184226/https://www.alfred.edu/about/map/index.cfm).

For more information, see [Directions to Alfred University](http://web.archive.org/web/20250910184226/https://www.alfred.edu/about/map/driving-directions.cfm).

admission_text:
Like most museums, our membership system is divided into multiple tiers to reflect different capacities for giving. Please join us at whatever level works best for you!

## Membership Tiers and Benefits

  * **$25****Discounted Basic Members** **(for Students and Seniors only).** These members receive the same benefits as Basic Members.
  * **$35 Basic Members.** For around $3/month, Basic Members receive free access to the museum, our annual newsletter [Ceramophile](http://web.archive.org/web/20250918191102/https://www.flipsnack.com/alfredceramicartmuseum/), 10% off all catalog purchases, and access to the [Empire State Museums Reciprocal Program](membership-reciprocal.html) (providing free admission to 21 different museums, galleries, and art centers in New York State.)
  * **$50** **Family Members.** For about $4/month, Family Members have the above benefits for two adults and their children.
  * **$50****Individual Plus Members.** For about $4/month, Individual Plus members in addition can bring one accompanied guest per visit.
  * **$125 Supporting Members.** HIGHLY RECOMMENDED! For about $10/month, Supporting Members additionally receive a one year subscription to [Ceramics Now](http://web.archive.org/web/20250918191102/https://www.ceramicsnow.org/), as well as membership in the [North American Reciprocal Museum (NARM) Association](http://web.archive.org/web/20250918191102/https://narmassociation.org/), which provides free admission and/or discounts at over 800 institut...

### Museum Closures

Alfred Ceramic Art Museum will be closed for the Thanksgiving Holiday on **Thursday, November 27 and Friday, November 28.**

The Museum will also be closed **December 15, 2025 - February 11, 2026** to switch exhibitions. We will reopen on February 12 from 5 to 7 p.m. for the Opening Reception for _Sharif Bey: Autoethnography_ and _Eugene Ofori Agyei: Fihankra (You Did Not Say Goodbye When You Left Home)._

* * *

The Museum is located on the northeast corner of Main and Pine Streets on the Alfred University campus. View more information on [exhibitions](exhibitions/index.html) or [visiting the Museum](visit.html). Museum [membership information](membership.html) is available online, or by contacting Alfred Ceramic Art Museum, Membership Office, Alfred University, Alfred, New York 14802. Benefits to members include free admission to the museum, 10% off catalog purchases, a subscription to the annual Museum newsletter, "Ceramophile," and invitations to celebrate special exhibitions and educational programs, and invitations to participate in Museum-sponsored trips.
